mapper.insert: insert into FACILITIES_HISTORY (FAC_NO, MEM_ACCT, HIST_DATE, HIST_TIME, HIST_AMOUNT) values( #{facNo}, #{memAcct}, #{histDate}, #{histTime}, #{histAmount} )
mapper.select: select * from V_FACHIST_FAC_MEM order by HIST_NO asc
select * from V_FACHIST_FAC_MEM where MEM_ACCT = #{memAcct} order by HIST_DATE asc;
select HIST_DATE, FAC_NO, sum(HIST_AMOUNT) as TOTAL from FACILITIES_HISTORY where FAC_NO = #{facNo} and month(HIST_DATE) = #{month} group by HIST_DATE, FAC_NO order by HIST_DATE
mapper.delete: delete from FACILITIES_HISTORY where FAC_NO = #{facNo} and MEM_ACCT = #{memAcct} and HIST_DATE = #{histDate} and HIST_TIME = #{histTime} and HIST_AMOUNT = #{histAmount}
